Name: Galactic Gladiators
About the game: 'Galactic Gladiators' is a 2D top-down shooter game. You control a spaceship and face off against hordes of enemies as you progress through levels. At each level, you can choose a card that will grant unique abilities to help you defeat your opponents. Additionally, you can collect crystals to upgrade your ship or buy a new and more powerful one. The ultimate goal is to get as far as possible, defeating bosses and facing increasingly challenging obstacles. Test your combat skills in space with 'Galactic Gladiators'. At the start, the player only begins with the basic attributes of the starting ship. At the end of each round, the player can choose a new skill card to use passively in the next level. The game features: - 3 ships. - 19 card options.
